work.name: Bornlogic
highlights: Led front-end development of the company's new "Business Center", using TypeScript and React.
Helped standardize the platform's user interface with the development of the internal reusable components library, documented in Storybook.
Collaborated on the development of various applications under the micro-frontends architecture, using Single SPA and webpack.
Contributed to the platform's stability by writing integration tests with Playwright and React Testing Library.

work.name: Mutual
highlights: Developed web applications with Create React App and Next.js in TypeScript, using Material UI.
Developed mobile products with React Native, using react-native-cli and Expo.
Improved error monitoring for web and mobile applications using Sentry and GitLab CI/CD, facilitating the identification and resolution of bugs in production.
Wrote integration tests for web and mobile applications using Cypress and React Testing Library.

education.institution: Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro

projects.name: Personal Blog and Website
highlights: Developed a static website using Astro and Tailwind CSS, hosted with GitHub Pages.
Implemented integration tests with Playwright to validate the site's stability and usability.
Wrote articles about web development, developer tools, mathematics, statistics, and data visualization.
Added interactive code examples to articles using CodeSandbox and React, facilitating practical learning for readers.
